mapper.insert: INSERT INTO conversations ( id, user_id, scenario_id, scenario_type, character_vectordb_id, parent_conversation_id, title, is_root, has_been_forked, is_private, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{user.id}, #{scenarioId}, #{scenarioType}, #{characterVectordbId}, #{parentConversation.id}, #{title}, #{isRoot}, #{hasBeenForked}, #{isPrivate}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.user_id, c.scenario_id, c.scenario_type, c.character_vectordb_id, c.parent_conversation_id, c.title, c.is_root, c.has_been_forked, c.message_count, c.like_count, c.is_private, c.created_at, c.updated_at FROM conversations c WHERE c.id = #{id}

SELECT c.id, c.user_id, c.scenario_id, c.scenario_type, c.character_vectordb_id, c.parent_conversation_id, c.title, c.is_root, c.has_been_forked, c.message_count, c.like_count, c.is_private, c.created_at, c.updated_at FROM conversations c WHERE c.id = #{id}
